overview: Satoko Sato (32), who lives in her parents' house in Nara. Since the loss of her beloved grandmother in Corona, he has been discouraged and retired from his job. Though she thinks he has to do something, she spends lazy days every day without working. She is told by his parents to work, but he goes to work, but he accidentally enters the fortune-telling room, and Satoko's stray begins from there.
title: I've Died a Lot Lately
